headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.youtube.com https://www.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https://i.ytimg.com; connect-src 'self' https://www.googleapis.com https://*.googleapis.com https://*.youtube.com https://*.ytimg.com; frame-src https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com; media-src 'self' blob: https://*.googlevideo.com; frame-ancestors 'self'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'
